There are four pegs that has its own grip or knob on it to help us adjust the tension of the strings when we play the string (Peg paste is a paste to put on the stick to smoothly stop at that position).

A string is to make the sound from using the bow or pluck the string. There is also four stringss with four pegs. You can replace different position. The thinner the string is, the higher note it have (Peg paste can make the sound flat of sharp).

The Hair part of the bow is a horse\'s hair on their tail so you can play the bow on the string. But you need a rosin to brush it on the bow or you can\'t produce the real sound of violin. The Screw part of bow is to loosen or tighten up the bow.
The bridge on the violin is like any constructed bridge that carries the vibration of the string to the violin\'s body and come out from the two F-Holes on both side of the bridge.
A tail piece is on many stringed musical instruments that put on the end of the strings with tuning mechanism. The string cannot be too tight or the tailpiece cannot withstand the string\’s tension.

A chinrest is a piece of material around the tailpiece that let players’ chin rest on the violin. There are many type of chinrests so it’s not a surprise that it is shaped differently on different violins.
